text:
November 10, 1939
Mr. M. Novik, Director
Municipal Broadcasting System
Municipal Building
New York City, New York
Dear Novik:
I have heard from Lemmon and no doubt will
survive the few days until I get repaid* Thanks
if you have gone to any trouble.
I see by the papers that McCarthy must be busy.
Cordially yours,
Frank E, Bchooley
